Name: Magical Valkyrie Lyristia
About the game: The evil organization Fakker has been terrorizing the residents of the city at night, abducting people left and right. One woman stands against them: Magical Valkyrie Frostia, a transforming hero who takes down any villains who stand against her. One day, she saves another woman with the potential to transform and fight alongside her. Will her new friend be able to transform into Magical Valkyrie Lyristia and stop Fakker's misdeeds for good? Features: Classic RPG Experience Turn-based combat Leveling System Skill System Contemporary Setting
